description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter called RecommendedMenuItemAdapter, used to display a list of recommended menu items in a food delivery Android app. It handles view creation, data binding, and item diffing.

classes.name: RecommendedMenuItemAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView ListAdapter for displaying recommended menu items, handling item diffing and click actions.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes ViewHolder instances for individual list items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds MenuItem data to the ViewHolder views, including setting images, texts, content descriptions, and click listeners.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to item view components for efficient access.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for efficiently determining item differences.
